text: @Nigel_Farage @BorisJohnson Then do something about it! Don’t just comment then hold your hands up and say that’s no my problem over to you Boris all political parties you should be outraged this behaviour isn’t protesting. It’s also a big up yours to all the nhs staff who risked their lives during covid-19
